parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "RMDSZ" (Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România - UDMR), a political party participating in the parliamentary elections.  This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  It's not a private message; therefore, it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's clear call to action ("Vasárnap vegyünk részt a választáson és támogassuk az RMDSZ-t!" - "Sunday, let's participate in the elections and support the RMDSZ!") directly aims to influence voters to support the RMDSZ. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it's a direct appeal for votes, lacking the neutrality expected from journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of the RMDSZ party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1084383169604194</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific political party (RMDSZ) participating in the elections, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the RMDSZ.  The post's call to action leaves no doubt about its intention to sway public opinion in favor of the party.  The fact that the post is a paid advertisement further strengthens the argument that it is intended for electoral purposes.  While the post does not contain a CMF number, this is not a decisive factor in determining whether it is electoral propaganda. The content itself is sufficient to classify it as such.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>RMDSZ</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vincze Loránt</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vincze Loránt, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1084383169604194), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează explicit partidul RMDSZ, îndemnând publicul la vot în favoarea acestuia cu fraza "Vasárnap vegyünk részt a választáson és támogassuk az RMDSZ-t!", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea RMDSZ. Reclama, cu o cheltuială estimată între 100 și 199 RON, a atins o audiență de peste 1 milion de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library, și utilizează un video pentru a-și transmite mesajul.  Contactul advertiserului este office@vinczelorant.eu și +40720616363.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
